name: Stick Stunt Biker: Xtreme Bike Racing Pro
name_original: Stick Stunt Biker: Xtreme Bike Racing Pro
description:
Ready for the new motorcycle racing game with unique bike routes!
Stick Rider : Gravity Stick is a motocross bike racing game for your smart phones.This game is uniquely designed for drifting over stick path and amazing motorcycle tracks.Stick Rider : Gravity Stick Offers many scenes and bike options to play and take a realistic riding experience.This game uses basic laws of physics and gravity principles.
Stick Rider Features-
1. A wide range of bike,these will take extreme to next level
2. Realistic riding experience and basic physics used.
3. High resolution graphics used.
4. Smooth tilt control and responsive accelerometer.
5. Real fast speed and easily control over the speed.
